### About (the academic) me
  
---
  
I am a Postdoctoral Scholar at the department of [Statistics of Univerisity of California - Irvine](https://www.stat.uci.edu/) (UCI), working under the supervision of Professor [Babak Shahbaba](https://www.ics.uci.edu/~babaks/).  
Before joining UCI, I obtained a Ph.D. in Statistics at University of Milan - Bicocca and Università della Svizzera italiana (joint program, awarded with honors).  
I am interested in Bayesian statistics, Bayesian nonparametrics, model-based clustering, shrinkage priors, and dimensionality reduction.
